overview: Sean Michaels is the gigolo: he makes women wet with lust. Sure, he has wild, passionate sex with beautiful babes - they even pay him for it. But this graphic look at a dashing male prostitute uncovers more than slick, hungry pussies and torrid interracial heat. Faced with the treachery of the business, the gigolo must fight for his life. Beneath the expensive suits, vintage cars and animal sexual prowess, a deep sophisticated, sensitive man is revealed...truly more than a whore.
title: More Than a Whore
